claims.object: Failure modes of eutectic SnPb and SnAgCu flip-chip solder joints
Transport of material caused by the gradual movement of the ions in a conducting metal

surface_layer.definition: The transport of material caused by the gradual movement of the ions in a conducting metal due to the momentum transfer between conducting electrons and diffusing metal atoms.

deep_layer.mechanism: Momentum transfer between conducting electrons and diffusing metal atoms.
deep_layer.origin: Microscopic atomic diffusion processes in metals.

citations: Interface Engineering of Electrical Contacts | Phys. Rev. Applied
